title: How Do I Join the Open Beta for the New Launcher?

embed.description: Upgrading to Beta Features Tech Account stuff Who can participate in open beta? Is it possible to lose access to open beta? How do I download and install the updated client? Can I uninst...

body: According to this official Q&A post there should have been a prompt and even a link to download the beta client, but I haven't encountered either. I've seen all sorts of screenshots and videos on the launcher, so I'm assuming it is publicly available, but I also can't find anything on how to install it.

replies.body:
I clicked the thing away and i didnt saw the link anywhere in my launcher, after some digging i found the file that keeps your preference about the client. its in : 

> Rito Games\League of Legends\RADS\system\user.cfg

and change leagueClientOptIn from no to yes.

restart client and enjoy the new beta client..
wait how to do that? i dont know how to opt in from out
You sir are a life saver. i sat here for 2 hours to try to get it to work.
Thanks, i was looking for this and it worked.

Open beta is not currently available and it may not start on your region right away.  Once active, you'll receive a notification through the client per the [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h1q2).  Hang tight, more details will come in!
Unfortunately, I don't have any details or eta's on that until it's live.  I recommend bookmarking the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay updated.

I'm having problems as well, and this is after a few days of this post being made. Haven't encountered a download link or anything. In my case, though, my account was in another region, and I transferred a few days ago when it was availible. Would like to download and help report bugs with the beta, but can't {{item:3070}}
